title: Valid Ontology Term JSON Schema
description: Schema for file containing metadata for Ontology Terms accepted in dataset submissions to CZ CellXGene Data Portal.

label.description: human-readable name for the ontology entry.

deprecated.description: Indicates whether the ontology entry is deprecated.

ancestors.description: A map of ancestor ontology terms that this term is a subclass of, keyed to the distance from the term.

comments.description: Optional comments regarding the ontology entry from ontology curators.

term_tracker.description: Optional URL to track discussion around the term's history and changes.

consider.description: Suggests alternative IDs to consider in place of this ontology entry.

replaced_by.description: If deprecated, the ID of the ontology entry that should canonically replace this one.
